message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $950,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value.  While I'm unable to accept $950,000, I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000. I believe this reflects the true worth of the product and offers a fair deal for both of us.

I appreciate your response, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with $1,000,000. This is the maximum amount I am willing to pay for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement that is satisfactory for both of us.
